name: Swamp Servers - Admin Stuffs
description: Something for the admins to use.
additional_info: Update 1.6 • Forced word-breaks on bancards with very long notes. • Added ability to customize color of ban headers. Update 1.5 • Adjust the color of another input field. Update 1.4 • Adjusted the color of several input fields to be easier to see. • Widened certain input fields. • Adjusted border color of certain buttons. Update 1.3 • Adjusted color of the filter input field. Update 1.2 • Adjusted expired/appealed bans color. • Adjusted color of logs.
